overview: Deep Purple Mark III  recorded and aired live by ABC-TV on 6 April 1974 at the Ontario Speedway near Los Angeles, California USA.  TRACKS: 01. Burn  02. Might Just Take Your Life  03. Lay Down, Stay Down  04. Mistreated  05. Smoke on the Water  06. You Fool No One / The Mule  07. Space Truckin' /// David Coverdale - vocals / Ritchie Blackmore - guitar / Glenn Hughes - bass and vocals / Jon Lord - organ / Ian Paice - drums
title: Deep Purple - California Jam 1974
